                                of the old stack will be no longer be available. You can find the  complete list here.
                            
                            

                            
                                Read this guide to learn how to download this course before the old platform shuts down. 

                                The guide provides two ways to download the courses - Chrome Plugin and Python Script. Depending on which method you use, check the appropriate sections below for further details.
                            
                            
                            
                                To download this course you need to be enrolled in the course.
                                                                    You can enroll for the course here:
                                    https://www.coursera.org/course/globalenvmanangement
                                                            

                            Chrome Plugin

                                                            You can download the course materials for this course by visiting the following url (you need to be logged in):
                                                                        https://class.coursera.org/globalenvmanangement-001/lecture
                                
                            
                            Python Script
                            
                                                                For the python script to work you will need a class name. Pick one from below:
                                                                    globalenvmanangement-001
                                
                                
                                If more than one class name below, pick the last one. If the script fails, pick the one above that and try again. Not all of these class names are guranteed to work.


                            






                        
                    
                    This course explores how we in the globalized world manages the environmental challenges. Pollution problems, lack of clean water and other resources are mainly a result of human actions and the way we have chosen to live. We are are all connected, for better or worse, polluting across boarders, consuming things that are supplied and produced in other parts of the world. Every society has strengths and weaknesses and we will look at how environmental challenges are handled differently in different societies. The course will focus on environmental technologies and how they are managed. We will present and discuss this on systemic level, focusing on getting a clear understanding of advantages and drawbacks, the related technologies and their viability in different settings around the world. It is important to understand that a technology and management solution has to work in the environment and society it is meant for.

                                            Syllabus
                        Week one is spent on getting up to date with the global trends, like what we know about global warming, demographic development and global resources; where we are right now? Week two and three the focus is on management aspect, how storm water and solid waste are managed by utilities, how decisions are taken locally and globally and how people are involved in these processes. In week four and five we look at the technical solutions: What are the state of the art technologies when it comes to avoid polluting drinking water sources? How can we recycle scarce resources? How to better utilize land resources?
title: Global Environmental Management
